name: No Vacancy
description:
Heaven is running out of space!

You play as God and your Job is to corrupt every good human left on Earth to keep them from accessing Heaven.

Good humans are wearing blue shirts (Bad ones are dressed in red, don’t mind them).

When you click on a human you can see its weakness, lifespan (represented by the green bar) and their Good/Bad balance (represented by the blue/red bar).

Your goal is to change humans into sinners by clicking on the sin corresponding to their weakness.

(Write « thanos » on your keyboard for special effect)

---------------------

Game created for Ludum Dare #42

Theme : Running out of space

Time : 72 hours

Controls : Mouse

By: Théo Verpillat (UnBonJusDeFruits)

Known bug: Sometimes sin buttons doesn't work anymore. Fix soon.

~~~ Linux Version Coming soon ~~~
